name: Hyper Adrenaline
description:
Hyper Adrenaline is a frenetic, sci-fi ambiented FPS made by Hard Bytes. We are a group of six Alicante's university Multimedia engineers. Fight against the metal legion in order to retrieve the Hyper Adrenaline, the most powerful source of energy in the galaxy, in order to stop an imminent invasion.

You impersonate Lt. Liam. She is ready for action, carrying up to 7 unique weapons and being able to perform a dash that can avoid the greatest of dangers and get you the upper hand in combat.

You can purchase health and ammo kits along the way to make this robot-slaying massacre so much fun, you will even forget it only has two levels :)

As we've said, we did this for our personal growth. This is a project we've made from scratch, using irrlicht and then switching to our own engine, to which you can find the code in one of the *show more* links.

Follow us on twitter: @Hard_Bytes
